meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Salvo Candela Katie Newcomb Rebecca Rider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6579.

td.p: Salvo Candela, a university administrator from New York, New York
Katie Newcomb, a paralegal from Washington, D.C.
Rebecca Rider, an office supply sales assistant from Fresh Meadows, New York (whose 5-day cash winnings total $101,600)

tr.td: FICTIONAL BEER
COMPLETES THE BESTSELLER TITLE
MANHATTAN PROJECTS
DRESSED-DOWN FIRST NAMES
KING LOUIS
SOWING "OTE"s
